name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **C#**, **Java**, and cloud platforms including **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**. My proficiency in **microservices** architecture and event-driven systems is complemented by hands-on experience with ** CI/CD** pipelines, ensuring robust software delivery through best practices such as **TDD**, and principles like **SOLID** and **DRY**. I thrive in **Agile** environments, utilizing methodologies like **Kanban** to enhance team collaboration and project efficiency.

I have a proven track record in leading full-stack development projects, utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** while delivering high-performance solutions across healthcare and financial sectors. My experience also includes the integration of AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and real-time data processing. I am well-versed in developing machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows, utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Strong communication and leadership skills enable me to guide teams in creating secure applications compliant with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
